subject: Interscholastic Athletics
Football
Scholarships and Fellowships
Police
lead_paragraph: A Houston-area high school football standout who had orally committed to play at the University of Oklahoma next year was shot to death at an apartment complex on Friday.The police arrested a 19-year-old Louisiana man, Emile Lewis, and charged him with murder.Herman Mitchell, 17, died at Ben Taub General Hospital of multiple wounds, said Lt. John Martin of the Harris County Sheriff’s Office. The 6-foot, 200-pound senior linebacker for Westfield High School had accepted a scholarship offer to play for Oklahoma.Witnesses reported that Mitchell and another teenager were fighting in the parking lot before the shooting, Martin said.
